q1: What percentage calculations can I do?
a1: Three modes: (1) What is X% of Y? (2) X is what percent of Y? (3) What is the percentage change from X to Y?
a2: Yes, you can enter decimal values like 3.5% or any precise number.
q3: Is this calculator free to use?
a3: Yes, it is completely free with no limits. All processing happens in your browser.
